entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
